findings.details: Post site CTA now opens in a new tab only for off-site destinations to reduce unnecessary tab spawning on same-site links.
Manual scan for http:// and placeholder domains in templates/pages/posts did not surface issues. External link availability not verified (network restricted).
External-only rel/target behavior for the post site CTA reduces mixed navigation signals and improves user flow.
Recent content maintains consistent summaries, metadata, and CTA structure.

recommendations: Continue verifying external news links with network checks when available
Consider adding same-site CTA tracking if analytics needs per-post outbound metrics
